sourcesContent:
function Basket({ cart, onRemoveFromCart }) { const overallTotal = cart.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + item.price * item.quantity, 0 ); return (
{cart.length === 0 ? (

Oops! Your basket is empty!

) : (

Basket

{cart.map((item, index) => (

{item.vegname}

Quantity: {item.quantity} kg

Price: ₹{item.price}/kg

Total: ₹{(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

))}

Overall Total: ₹{overallTotal.toFixed(2)}

)}
); }
